casebody.data:
RIGGSBEE
v.
JONES, et al. 237P16-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2017 Avery M. Riggsbee, for Riggsbee, Avery M.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th of April 2017 by Plaintiff for Grant of Nonstop Payout by Defendants:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd of May 2017."
